backend/main.mo: Defines user roles including new client role, manages user profiles, access control, and owner/admin enforcement with profile save and retrieval functions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old state structures to new ones by adding client role support and initializing new request fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping requested features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing routing, hooks, components, and role-based behavior updates including client role support.
frontend/docs/change-request-intake.md: Template form for documenting requested UI changes with required details, verification steps, and approval before implementation.
frontend/docs/edubridge-roles-requests-a: Documentation explaining user roles, request submission rules, landing page behavior, account creation, request form logic, and admin review workflows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app root and main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and strict change‑request process requiring documented and confirmed specifications before implementing UI changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining all routes, protected areas, redirects, and layout/theme providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsC: Displays admin dashboard stats using cards and icons for users, requests, and ratings.
frontend/src/components/animation/Floati: Renders animated blurred shape backgrounds for decorative visual effects.
frontend/src/components/animation/Reveal: Component that reveals content with a fade/slide animation when it enters the viewport.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return home when authorization fails.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Chat interface for request conversations handling messages, permissions, auto-scroll, and unauthorized states.
Wrapper around Input that restricts allowed input types for safer form usage.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component handling navigation, theming, and role‑based links with responsive header UI.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Typing: Animated typing hero text that cycles through a full string with type and delete effects.
frontend/src/components/owner/TelegramCo: Card UI for viewing and updating Telegram bot configuration using admin hooks and form inputs.
frontend/src/components/ratings/RatingDi: Dialog for submitting a star rating and comment for a helper, posting via useAddRating.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Filter UI for searching requests, toggling offline‑only, and filtering by city.
Grid of request cards showing status, location, and optional chat/unread indicators with selection handling.
Success banner card after submitting a request with navigation buttons to dashboard or create another.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-only queries and mutations for users, requests, analytics, and deletion actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Handles authentication state via Internet Identity, user profile loading, role helpers, and dashboard navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Implements message fetching, sending, marking as read, and unread count queries for chat tied to a request.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller’s user profile via actor methods with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRatings.ts: Supports adding ratings and fetching ratings for the helper or a specific user.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequests.ts: Supplies CRUD-like hooks for creating, listing, and filtering work requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode, utility classes, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateAccountPage.tsx: Handles account creation flow with login, profile form, and role selection, saving user data and redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard fetching users, requests, and analytics with delete actions and authorization/error states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/HelperDash: Helper dashboard listing available and assigned requests with filters and chat access for selected items.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/StudentDas: Student dashboard showing categorized request statuses, stats, and message notifications with chat integration.
frontend/src/pages/FreelancingHelpPage.t: Provides a form for students or businesses to submit freelancing help requests and shows a success banner on submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero content, features, and navigation actions including role‑based account creation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to their dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and a button returning users to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerConsolePag: Owner console displaying business stats, request counts, analytics, and Telegram configuration status.
Displays the owner inbox with filters for request statuses and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerRequestDet: Shows detailed information for a specific request and allows owners to approve, reject, or view chat.
frontend/src/pages/StudentRequestHelpPag: Lets students or businesses submit online or offline help requests, validating input and showing a success banner after creation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkRequestPage.tsx: Form page for users to submit work requests with validation, role checks, and request creation via mutation.
frontend/src/routes/ProtectedRoute.tsx: Wraps routes with authentication, role, and admin checks, rendering redirects or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/seo/usePageTitle.ts: Hook that updates the document title for each page.
frontend/src/utils/helpRequestErrors.ts: Maps backend error messages for help requests to user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileExtras.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears extra profile metadata in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s current state, requirements, and features for enhancing a web app with new user roles, updated flows, submission options, and admin review workflows. Includes architectural notes, versioning, and a list of existing feature definitions.
